Title: Strategic Sales Lead
Description: Client Strategist for top US based companies with a global presence, working to extend the value that First Advantage can provide with our entire suite of industry leading solutions.  First Advantage is the leader in Pre-Employment Screening and Background Checks. First Advantage is a Silver Lake Partners company delivering world-class Solutions and Insights that enable our Clients to reduce risk and hire the best talent.   Our Services include: Background Checks; Drug & Alcohol Testing; Post Hire Criminal Monitoring; Fleet Compliance; Tax Credits & Compliance; Analytics & Reporting; Fingerprinting; Driver Services; Occupational Health; Residential Screening; and Affordable Care Act Compliance  We promise to deliver: •	Best Applicant Experience •	Enabling Fastest Time-to-Hire •	Leading Technology & Analytics •	Largest Global Capabilities

Title: President
Description: NorthCourse Consulting LLC. is a boutique service firm that specializes in end-to-end solutions for our valued clients.  We focus on value creation for businesses through both strategic consulting in marketing or business development -and- utilizing our years of expertise to represent our clients in the sale or acquisition of businesses (m&a).  We represent your interests and work very closely with our clients through what is a very important, and often personal process.  Our success comes through the utilization of a proven value-driving method we deploy for generating business or introducing our clients to either side of the merger & acquisition process.  Because we only work with a select number of clients at any given time, you can expect the highest level of service and personal interaction for transactions of this nature.

Company Name: Akron General Partners | Akron General Health System
Title: Director, Business Development & Strategic Initiatives
Description: Akron General Partners was formed in 2006 and its primary business is the provision of outpatient healthcare services to the greater Akron community. Akron General Partners owns and operates Akron General's outpatient facilities, including the Health & Wellness Center - West (Montrose) Health & Wellness Center - North (Stow) and Health & Wellness Center - Green (Green).  ------------------- Mr. Edwards will act as director of the following: * Strategic initiatives - Corporate partnerships * Wellness consulting opportunities * AGP business development efforts * Physician alignment * IT start-ups

Title: Managing Director
Description: Akron General Health & Wellness Innovations (HWI) brings decades of experience to provide comprehensive health & wellness solutions to health systems, universities, municipalities, health insurance providers and self-insured corporations across the United States. HWI brings it's intellectual property forward to help people nationwide "get well and stay well".  These solutions include Akron General's nationally recognized Health & Wellness Center model (design, construction, finance and operations of the H&W Center facilities) and most recently, the co-development of innovative wellness based software products that will help with physician-led accountability and oversight.  HWI is positioned to help with population health.   Through the collective success and experience of the leadership at Akron General Health System, Akron General Health & Wellness Innovations offers comprehensive health & wellness services and products, providing creative solutions in a “peer to peer” manner – as a health system to other health systems.  HWI delivers innovative services and creates new revenue opportunities for organizations interested in complementing traditional sick care and inpatient admissions with a keen focus on wellness, prevention, and outpatient care.  Let us help you bring Wellness to your community. -------------------- Mr. Edwards is responsible for the creation of Akron General Health & Wellness Innovations and oversees the daily operations.   As the Managing Director of Akron General Health & Wellness Innovations, Matt leads the innovations effort for Akron General helping to improve the health & lives of the people in greater Akron, Ohio and extending those successes to other health systems nationally.  He also directs existing consulting projects for HWI and has responsibilities on strategic projects for the health system.
